txt.en:
'Well met, [placeholder]. It is fortunate for me that you have come along. I have a favour to ask of you if would spare a moment. My fellow rune-keepers and I have learned of a foul creature housed within the Sixteenth Hall: the frost-grim Helegfan.

'Many young rune-keepers are seeking this fell spirit, but I doubt any would succeed alone. They will need your help.  

'If you are willing, enter the Sixteenth Hall and aid a rune-keeper in this task. Return to me when you have succeeded, and I will reward you.'

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest can only be completed by helping a rune-keeper on its Legendary Trait quest \qSecrets Long Forgotten.\q</rgb>

'Excellent work, [placeholder]. Now then, here is your reward.

'Durin's Folk everywhere owe you thanks for your efforts this day. You've done a great deed in the effort to reclaim the lost realm of Khazad-dûm.

'If you should ever come back this way, be sure to check with me before entering the Sixteenth Hall once again. There are likely to be other rune-keepers in the future who will need help facing their own challenges.'
A Rune of Restoration:  Lending a Hand
Many rune-keepers seek the Rune of Restoration, but not all can accomplish their goals alone.

Helegfan can be found in the Sixteenth Hall, at the south-eastern tip of Nud-Melek, just north of the Foundations of Stone.\n\nRíon has instructed you to aid your fellow rune-keepers with their final task upon the path to obtain a Rune of Restoration.
Talk to Ríon outside the Sixteenth Hall
Ríon is just outside of the Sixteenth Hall.\n\nYou should return to Ríon and inform him of your success.
